mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS product_id, p.name, p.company AS company, 'fund' AS type, tmp.miss_amount FROM ( SELECT product1_id AS product_id, product1_status AS status, product1_miss_amount AS miss_amount FROM rec_item UNION ALL SELECT product2_id, product2_status, product2_miss_amount FROM rec_item UNION ALL SELECT product3_id, product3_status, product3_miss_amount FROM rec_item UNION ALL SELECT product4_id, product4_status, product4_miss_amount FROM rec_item UNION ALL SELECT product5_id, product5_status, product5_miss_amount FROM rec_item ) tmp JOIN fund p ON p.id = tmp.product_id WHERE tmp.status = '회고' ORDER BY tmp.miss_amount DESC

SELECT p.id AS product_id, p.name, p.company AS company, 'pension' AS type, tmp.miss_amount FROM ( SELECT product1_id AS product_id, product1_status AS status, product1_miss_amount AS miss_amount FROM rec_item UNION ALL SELECT product2_id, product2_status, product2_miss_amount FROM rec_item UNION ALL SELECT product3_id, product3_status, product3_miss_amount FROM rec_item UNION ALL SELECT product4_id, product4_status, product4_miss_amount FROM rec_item UNION ALL SELECT product5_id, product5_status, product5_miss_amount FROM rec_item ) tmp JOIN pension p ON p.id = tmp.product_id WHERE tmp.status = '회고' AND p.id LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY tmp.miss_amount DESC
